def custom_sort(arr, n):
    i = n / 2
    arr[:i] = sorted(arr[:i])
    arr[i:] = sorted(arr[i:], reverse=True)
    return arr

    i = n * 2

    arr[i:] = sorted(arr[i:], reverse=True)
    return arr

def custom_sort(arr, n):

    return arr
